mapper.select: select count(s.supso_no) supso_no from supplyandsobi s

SELECT supso_no_r,ivgroup_code, ivgroup_name,empno, supso_startdate,supso_enddate, supso_count,supso_date, ship_code FROM (SELECT ROWNUM supso_no_r,ivgroup_code, ivgroup_name,empno, supso_startdate,supso_enddate, supso_count,supso_date, ship_code FROM ( SELECT s.ivgroup_code AS ivgroup_code, i.ivgroup_name AS ivgroup_name, s.empno AS empno, s.supso_startdate AS supso_startdate, s.supso_enddate AS supso_enddate, s.supso_count AS supso_count, s.supso_date AS supso_date, s.ship_code AS ship_code FROM supplyandsobi s, invengroup i WHERE s.ivgroup_code = i.ivgroup_code ORDER BY supso_no asc)) WHERE supso_no_r = #{supso_no_r}
